New_Rochelle.Rodman's Neck:
Rodman's Neck refers to a peninsula of land in the Bronx, New York that juts out into Long Island Sound.
The southern third of the "neck" is used as a firing range by the New York City Police Department; the remaining wooded section is part of Pelham Bay Park. The north side is joined to what used to be Hunters Island and Twin Island to form Orchard Beach and a parking lot.
